review: I got this product on sale before it's release for about twenty dollars and it was the best thing I ever bought. I had prime for over a year but it wasn't till I got the fire stick that I started watching the videos on my TV. It's super easy to plug in and use and I love it love it LOVE IT.  I recommend this product highly.
author: A Romance Junkie "Mady"

review: I'm severely disappointed in this product.  I would have expected this product to be able to play my local files already being served by a DLNA server.  The only way you can do it is to buy a $5 app from them AND put yet another media server on my network.  Without this, this just duplicates the functionality of the TiVo that I already have.
